question:
Which of the following statements are correct about pollutants?
1. Materials or factors, which cause adverse effect on the natural quality of any component of the environment are known as Pollutants.
2. A pollutant has the capability to cause either long- or short-term damage by changing the growth rate of plant or animal species.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Materials or factors, which cause adverse effect on the natural quality of any component of the environment are known as Pollutants. A pollutant has the capability to cause either long- or short-term damage by changing the growth rate of plant or animal species.
